string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
What? Oh, yes, great! Stalker, I need you to help one of my colleagues. Go to him quickly! He needs you!
Good luck stalker.
Sakharov Research Documents
Some of Professor Sakharov's research papers were left behind when his scientist fled from a mutant attack. Retrieve the documents and return them to Sakharov. The time of execution is 24 hours.

Ah, yes, I'm glad you're here. One of my researchers just returned from the field. He had to abandon his notes after being attacked by mutants. He is terrified to go back there. I need that research, stalker. Please retrieve it for me, I will gladly compensate you for your trouble. Keep in mind that anything can happen to paper, I give you no more than 24 hours.
Thank you! Please accept this as compensation for your time and effort:
Find %s Sample for Sakharov
Find a sample of the %s artefact and bring it back to Sakharov so he can research it. The execution time is 6 days.
Ah, yes, good! I have been expecting you. I am in need of an experienced artefact hunter to find a sample of a particular artefact for me.
I studied one anomalous sample in my lab, commonly known as {item_name}. Find another one for me, and I will gladly reward you for it. I'll give you six days to search.
Yes, good, good! Now my research can begin! Thank you stalker. You have done well.
Search Lab X-18
Professor Sakharov needs research documents from the X-18 laboratory in the Dark Valley.

Oh, yes. Good! I have an important job for you. Important research was conducted in Lab X-18 but we have been unable to gain access to analyze it. Do you think you can try to retrieve it for us? I will pay you well if you can.

Excellent! What you were able to accomplish is exactly what's delightful! You know, because there are only a few who can overcome it, so far there has not been a person who could come down to this abode of evil and survive, while bringing all that is required. You deserve a generous reward:
Raise Funds To Become Ecologist
Sakharov wants me to raise 17,000 UAH to help the Ecologists if I want to join them.

Ah, well, we don't normally recruit stalkers to become Ecologists. However, we just happen to currently be in a bit of a bind. We are running out of funding for our current research project. We need at least 17,000 UAH to keep it going. If you are willing to raise the money for us, you can join our camp.
Wonderful! Excellent! Thank you! Please, make yourself at home here, fellow Ecologist.
Semenov Research Hunt
Assistant Semenov has contracted you to escort him around the local area to kill mutants so that he can retrieve fresh tissue samples and analyse the corpses with his scanning equipment.

Would you mind helping me kill some mutants so that I can take readings and tissue samples? Let's say... About five different mutants. I'll be putting my life in your hands and you would need to ensure my safety. I will compensate you for your efforts.
Thank you for your assistance, friend. I have all the tissue samples I need. Here is your payment... Come back and see me again some time.
%s Tissue Sample for Sakharov
Sakharov needs a tissue sample from a %s.
I need an experienced stalker or a mutant hunter. Is that somebody you?
I need {item_count} {item_name} for my experiments. I don't care how you get it, just make sure it's fresh. Get here A.S.A.P. as soon as you recover what I need from the mutant.
Thank you, sir. This will help immensely in my research.
Pick up Psi-Helmet
Professor Sakharov has agreed to recalibrate the psi-protection helmet. He asked you to come back to pick it up in a couple days.
Disable the Miracle Machine
The Miracle Machine prevents stalkers from travelling between Yantar and the Dead City. Disabling it will require advanced psi-protective equipment.
Find %s for Kruglov
It is necessary to bring Kruglov %s so that he can provide a basic upgrade of weapons or a bulletproof vest.

I need help. A lot of colleagues are asking me to fix their equipment, but I can't. I don't have the right tools for this. I could fix almost any equipment if I had the right tools. Can you help me with that?
I need a tool kit for rough work. It should have everything I need. If you can bring it in, I won't be offended by the reward.
Perfect! This is exactly what I need. I can get to work right now!
Find %s for Kruglov
Need to get the %s and take them to Kruglov. He needs the best tools.
There's one more suggestion. That remnabor you brought me is good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Can you find me a better kit?
I need {item_name}. I don't know where you're gonna get it, but if you do, carry it straight to me, no offense.
You helped me again! Good job, here's the money:
Find and bring %s for Kruglov
Kruglov asked to find a set of tools for calibration. He will pay for the tool and will also be able to provide more complex equipment upgrades.
You brought me a great harness, but it wasn't all I needed. Do you think you can find me some calibration tools?
I need tools to calibrate. If you bring it in, you will get a discount on your repair.
You helped me out again! Nice work, here, hold the money:
